title: The Devil's Dime
description: The Samaritan Files TrilogyBook One - THE DEVIL'S DIMEShe is a beautiful, talented violinist. He is a crusader against crime, using his newspaper column to expose injustice and bring down those who lived on the take -- on the devil's dime. Now, in 1896 New York City, corruption and greed bring Addie and Jess to the brink of terror when his column puts an unwitting target on her father's back, and Jess must discover not only who wants this good man dead, but how to save the woman who has turned his world upside down and captured his heart.
author: Bailey Bristol
